name: Fresh Strawberry Bread
author: lizardsgarden
summary: If you like a moist fruit bread, this fresh strawberry bread is for you.
ingredients: ½ cup milk, or as needed
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 9x5x3-inch loaf pan
Pour vinegar into a measuring cup
Fill with milk to the 1/2 cup measuring mark
Blend sugar, cream cheese, and butter together using a pastry blender in a large bowl until combined and smooth
Add 1 egg at a time, blending after each addition
Add vanilla extract and mix until combined
Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a small bowl
Fold a quarter of the flour mixture at a time into egg mixture until batter is doughy
Fold in milk-vinegar mixture until blended, making sure not to overmix
Mix in mashed strawberries with their juices just until combined
Pour dough into the prepared pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean, 50 to 60 minutes
